Crossfit journal 03/10/2012

  • Oct 03 2012
  • Tagged training

WOD

Kettlebell hell - 20kg kb used in all exercises

  • 800 m run
  • 32 SDHP kb
  • 32 kb pushups
  • 32 one hand kb swings
  • 32 kb squats
  • 32 kb clean
  • 32 boxjumps
  • 800 m run

My time: 16:39 (23% improvement)

Last recorded time on 08/06/2012: 21:32

Time on 12/05/2012: 23:20
